title: Implement the Value Class Constructor
description:
Implement the `Value` class — the fundamental building block of our autograd engine. A `Value` wraps a scalar number and needs to track enough information to later reconstruct how it was computed.

Think about what a node in a computation graph needs to store. Also implement `__repr__` to return a string like `'Value(data=3.1400)'` (4 decimal places).
hints: _children should be converted to a set
